abstract.p: University of Miami Prof Darby Bannard letter notes, in response to Douglas Davis's article on museum Web sites, that newcrit.art.wmich.edu/ offers easy hyperlinks to art works (S)

block.p: You list many Web sites operated by museums across the country, but as Mr. Davis states correctly in his article, on the Internet, ''the clicking and leaping required to see a single painting rivals standing in the Mona Lisa line.'' That is why a friend and I created a site (http://newcrit .art.wmich.edu/) supported by our institutions, Western Michigan University and the University of Miami. Our site has a page of clearly described hyperlinked sites, which have images alphabetically listed by artists' names (go to Links: Image Sites). We think it will get you to most of the worthwhile art on the Web quicker and easier than anything else out there.
The writer is a professor of painting at the University of Miami at Coral Gables.
